profile_data.summary:
My interests lie in developing novel artificial intelligence, machine learning, data fusion, image and signal processing tools for improved disease diagnosis, prognosis, and evaluating patients' response to treatment. I love developing simple and efficient automated solutions to biologically motivated problems and modeling expert-driven findings for improved disease characterization. I am currently focused on identifying non-invasive markers on imaging for precision medicine solutions in brain tumors and other neurological disorders. 

Specialties: AI, machine learning, data mining, multi-modal fusion, oncology, precision medicine, neuroimaging, computer-aided diagnosis. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pallavi_Tiwari
